711825f-a.text:
E. 26th Street, at the S. E. corner of Third Avenue, (right) not shown). This modern apartment house was a drastic change from the tenements from which it was reconstructed. Note in the foreground a W. P. A. sewer project.
1936
Gift of Committee on Housing
Charity Organization Society

708028f-a.text:
(1)
Third Ave., east side, north from East 26th Street, showing in the background, (left to right) the Chanin and Chrysler Buildings. Also seen is the 28th Street station of the Third Ave. Elevated Line.
December 23, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a point slightly northward.
December 23, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
